title: Treat Yourself: 13 Indulgent Items for the Ultimate Staycation
text:
Photo: All the Courtesy of danishdesignstore.com See more photos of: 
As glamorous as it can be to jet off to a tropical beach or a remote ski chalet for the long weekend, there’s no denying that sometimes taking a quick getaway can be more exhausting than restorative. The packing! The traffic! The mad dash to the airport! It’s no wonder we often return in need of another vacation—or at the very least another day off. But those who prefer to spend the extra downtime in the comfort of their own home needn’t miss out on the luxury or novelty of a far-flung locale: All it takes is a little imagination and a few choice accoutrements. From the latest page-turner to a silky piece of banana-leaf loungewear to snacks worthy of a five-star hotel mini bar, here is everything you need to indulge in the ultimate staycation. So go ahead, and kick up your feet—and remember, it’s okay to feel a little smug about avoiding that TSA screening line.
